name: fullstack-2020-osa3
description: Fullstack course held by University of Helsinki.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../Fullstack-2020/osa2/puhelinluettelo/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build/ ../../../etc/Fullstack-2020-osa3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Markus Andersson
